title: parAkElanE O
sahitya:
parAkElanE O parAmbikE parita pincu I patituni brOva parAkElanE O parAmbikE


anupallavi

  purANi nI pada sarOjamE gati


caraNam 1    madhurA nilayE mOhana muraLI sudhA vinOdini pAvani janani
    caraNam 2    hariyincunu mahA khalamu smariyincina nI caraNamu niratamu dEvI 
karuNa jUDu sharaNaNTini shankari niruDa nI mahima delpaga vashamA
